caption.title: The pooled temperature-morbidity association by latitude in all 47 Japanese prefectures.
caption.p: Predictions for the 25 th (dot-dashed line) and 75 th (dashed line) percentiles of latitude from meta-regression for ( a) overall cumulative summary, and predictor-specific summaries at ( b) 25 th and ( c) 75 th percentiles of temperature. Reference at 50 th percentile of temperature.
